question: When does Real National income increase?
option3: When Inflation increases prices and taxes
option4: When the production of goods and services increases
answer: When the production of goods and services increases
explanation: As the calculation of national income is the total value of all goods and services in an economy the real increase happens when the output production increases. The rate change wonâ€™t affect because while calculating real national income we take into account the prices of base year. So even the inflation effect is also removed.
